CatDescriptText: Dr. Charles J. Burks was the first African American physician with hospital privileges at Montefiore Hospital in 1948.  He also established PBA, The Second Step drug rehabilitation program.
TitMainTitle: Men and women picketing outside Allegheny Children's Center, with signs reading "Manchester Citizens Support Dr. C. J. Burks" and "Dr. Muldoc reinstate Dr. Burks"
